Returns: true if this task is periodic
isPeriodic().Description: Returns true if this task is periodic. A periodic task may re-run according to some schedule. A non-periodic task can be run only once.

ClassDesc: A @B_java#util#concurrent#ScheduledFuture_E@ that is @B_java#lang#Runnable_E@. Successful execution of the run method causes completion of the Future and allows access to its results.
